# EnumFormatter.Deserialize method

Deserializes a string and returns the enum equivalent.

```csharp
public object Deserialize(string strValue)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| strValue | String value from file that must be deserialized. |

## Return Value

Enum of the correct type based on the string value
